entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: JsonSerializerOptions available via Action #69972
  • BigInteger multiplication result has incorrect sign #69970
  • Missing authorship information on 70 - 80 commits authored by @4creators #69968
  • "HttpClient TryAddWithoutValidation" problem #69967
  • `impNormStructVal`'s `OBJ(ADDR(LCL_VAR))` wrapping logic can be too permissive #69965
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Runtime error with System.Native : Unable to load shared library 'System.Native' or one of its dependencies. #67510
  • NativeAOT: IsInstanceOfType on interface fails in reflection-free #69960
  • Reading and Installing specific dotnet workload versions? #69951
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Net.Http.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerPerfTest #68824

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the signature's struct handle for making outgoing arg copies #69971
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Store actual signature types in CallArg and normalize to that type #69969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • notify pin changes one by one #69963
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve regex tests for offset start cases #69959
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Delete a dead rationalizer transform #69958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change wording of exception #69957
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #69956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Merged

  • changed frequently used redhawk mentions. #69962
    community-contribution
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rename NativeMemory.ZeroMemory #69948
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: fix jit stress now that W^X is enabled #69946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • Optimize Array.GetFlattenedIndex (all runtimes) and InternalGetValue (CoreCLR) #69940
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split out and generalize tailcall IR validation/tailcall profile adjustments #69941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1795678 #69932
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix build issues after enabling TRACE_GC #69766
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Enable JitConsumeProfileForCasts by default #69869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Gather 'Tellurium' team issues in team project #68193
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • add architecture enum PPC64le #68809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • WIP: Eliminate unnecessary load in `TrySetSlot` #69164
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimise `LastIndexOfAnyExcept` #69261
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Update RHEL and CentOS images #69791
    area-System.Net
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][doc] Update Android NDK version to r23c #69913
    documentation, area-Meta, os-android
  • [IGNORE] `perf-wasm` pipeline #69931
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add issue cleanup documentation and update automation #69857
    area-Meta
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • When using custom $(BaseIntermediateOutputPath) the build still picks files from obj/ #3485
    Discussion

Updated

  • `dotnet run` of a newly created ASP.NET Core project on MacOS prompts for password to allow keychain access #22544
    7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Eliminate use of ParsingTests.UsingTree("...", verifyErrors: false) #61586

Closed

  • Named arguments completions are broken in C# #61585

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed collection and object initializer usage analysis not working in top-level code #61584
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61583
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Add some APIs on AspNetCoreVirtualCharSequence #61554
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #61581
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61580
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61578
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why does SignInAuthenticationHandler inherit from SignOutAuthenticationHandler? #41918
  • Allow to specify the attribute's name independently to the C# property on ParameterAttribute in Razor Components #41917
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, https, multiple_queries #41915
  • HtmlFileResult #41914
  • Published blazor application not able to resolve promises inside blazorwebassembly.js #41913
  • Image from url (http) not show in Blazorwebview in wpf app #41912
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #41910
  • Blazor wasm size and load time is the worst and biggest problem ever and should be the #1 priority #41909
  • Add HttpContext ot ITicketStore methods (CookieAuthenticationHandler) #41908

Closed

  • Perf regression: json_netty #41911
  • Add HttpContext ot ITicketStore methods (CookieAuthenticationHandler) #41907

PullRequests

Created

  • catch JS exceptions during createJSCallResult and throw them in .NET #41916
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine ClientAbortingConnectionImmediatelyIsNotLoggedHigherThanDebug #41851
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make Contribution User Story Better #7596
  • RadioButton GroupName and IsChecked properties work inconsistently on Windows #7595
  • Compiling Mac app in VSforMac 2022 preview, app loses previously granted permissions #7593
  • Ability to set initial window size and position and restore previous values #7592
  • WSA Using Advanced Network Is Ignored by Visual Studio. #7591
  • ScrollView doesn't work properly on Android. #7590
  • AddWpfBlazorWebView failing in release #7589
  • 在Entry和Editor上输入，取消焦点和离开当前页后，键盘依然显示，并且影响页面。 #7588
  • Style is not replaced #7587
  • Application.Current.Resources no keys available #7585
  • DataTemplateSelector not returning DataTemplate used with BindableLayout FlexLayout #7584
  • Not possible to use the decimal comma on the numeric keyboard in Android. #7582
  • Changing visibility on an SwipeItem causes multiple items to be executed #7580
